definitions: the office or position of being in charge of an activity, department, or organization

examples.text: the Federal Bureau of Investigation rose to prominence under the directorship of J. Edgar Hoover
I was offered the directorship of the Museum of Fine Arts

shortDefinitions: office or position of being in charge of activity or organization

definitions: membership of the board of people that manages the affairs of a business

examples.text: she has held a number of directorships, including seats on local radio stations
he collected a couple of part-time jobs, including a directorship of Guardian Media Group

shortDefinitions: membership of board that manages business
